channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloud Foundry -- Stratos
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cloud Foundry -- Stratos

item.title: CVE-2019-3784|2024-09-16T18:56:08.918Z -- cloud%20foundry -- stratos
item.description: Cloud Foundry Stratos, versions prior to 2.3.0, contains an insecure session that can be spoofed. When deployed on cloud foundry with multiple instances using the default embedded SQLite database, a remote authenticated malicious user can switch sessions to another user with the same session id.
